snippet: At the core of New York City Pigeon Rescue Central are pigeon lovers, animal activists and eccentrics who dedicate themselves to the much-maligned birds’ welfare.
abstract: New York City Pigeon Rescue Central, group formed of pigeon lovers, animal activists and eccentrics, rescues and rehabilitates injured pigeons from streets.
lead_paragraph: At the core of New York City Pigeon Rescue Central are pigeon lovers, animal activists and eccentrics who dedicate themselves to the much-maligned birds’ welfare.

headline.seo: Rescuing the Birds Many Love to Hate

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York City Pigeon Rescue Central
